mapper.sql: `id` as `id` , `user_name` as `userName` , `password` as `password` , `name` as `name` , `sex` as `sex` , `birthday` as `birthday` , `telephone` as `telephone` , `email` as `email` , `description` as `description` , `status` as `status` , `creator` as `creator` , `create_time` as `createTime` , `update_time` as `updateTime` , `updater` as `updater` , `address` as `address`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( user_name , password , name , sex , birthday , telephone , email , description , status , creator , create_time , update_time , updater , address , ) VALUES ( #{user_name}, #{password}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{description}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{updater}, #{address} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE user
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
updater = #{updater},
update_time = #{updateTime},
user_name = #{userName},
password = #{password},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
birthday = #{birthday},
telephone = #{telephone},
email = #{email},
address = #{address},
description = #{description},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM user
AND id = #{id} AND status = 1

SELECT
FROM user WHERE status = 1 AND ${property} = #{value} ORDER BY create_time desc

SELECT
FROM user WHERE status = 1 AND ${property} = #{value} ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT 0,1
